about/index.html.title: About | Graph Permissions
about/index.html.keywords: About While the Microsoft Graph reference page provides a good summary of all the permissions it's not easy to find out the APIs and data that are made available when a consent is provided to an application. This site will help you quickly get a list of all the APIs for a given Graph permission scope. Please submit feedback and any issues here .
